description:
Toritsuka ropes Kusuo into helping him after a cute transfer student bumbles into their lives. She might be more than Kusuo can handle.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Kyoufu! Saiyaku no Tenkousei Arawaru! (Zenpen) / Kyoufu! Saiyaku no Tenkousei Arawaru! (Chuuhen) / Kyoufu! Saiyaku no Tenkousei Arawaru! (Kouhen) / Sign o Yome! Aiura Mikoto no Yochi / Saiyaku to Saiteki no Tatakai!!

Terrifying! A Disastrous Transfer Student Appears! (Part One) / Terrifying! A Disastrous Transfer Student Appears! (Part Two) / Terrifying! A Disastrous Transfer Student Appears! (Part Three) / Read the Signs! Mikoto Aiura`s Fortune Telling / A Disastrous and Optimal Battle!
恐怖! Ψ厄の転校生現る! (前編) / 恐怖! Ψ厄の転校生現る! (中編) / 恐怖! Ψ厄の転校生現る! (後編) / Ψンを読め! 相ト命の予知 / Ψ厄とΨ適の戦い!!
공포! 최악의 전학생 등장! (전편) / 공포! 최악의 전학생 등장! (중편) / 공포! 최악의 전학생 등장! (후편) / 징조를 읽어라! 아이우라 미코토의 예지 / 최악이자 최적의 싸움!
